name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Donald HARDCASTLE, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Donald HARDCASTLE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: William A. Fitzpatrick, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler Chief/Appeals Div., Eric B. Henson, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
501 A.2d 249
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Donald HARDCASTLE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 6, 1985.
Decided Dec. 10, 1985.
William A. Fitzpatrick, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler Chief/Appeals Div., Eric B. Henson, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
